NetSquid

  • netsquid.nodes
  • View page source
Previous Next

netsquid.nodesÔÉÅ

Nodes are composite components that represent the location entities (Entity) of a quantum network. At these locations classical and quantum operations are considered local. Connections are composite components that link remote nodes.

Modules

  • netsquid.nodes.node
    • Node
  • netsquid.nodes.connections
    • Connection
    • DirectConnection
  • netsquid.nodes.network
    • Network
    • NetworkError
